articles.description: Follow live text updates from day three of the fifth Test between India and England in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Anderson claims historic 700th Test wicket as India bowled out for 477

articles.description: Anthony Joshua delivers the most powerful statement to the heavyweight division with a destructive second-round knockout win over Francis Ngannou.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Francis Ngannou: Briton delivers statement win with second-round knockout

articles.description: England's James Anderson has become the first fast bowler to take 700 Test wickets after dismissing India's Kuldeep Yadav in the fifth Test.
articles.title: Anderson becomes first pace bowler to 700 Test wickets

articles.description: Red Bull motorsport adviser Helmut Marko is at risk of being suspended in the midst of the continuing controversy over Christian Horner.
articles.title: Red Bull adviser Helmut Marko at risk of suspension amid Christian Horner controversy

articles.description: Barcelona climb to second in La Liga after teenage winger Lamine Yamal's superb late winner gives them a 1-0 victory at home to Mallorca.
articles.title: Barca's Yamal, 16, curls in superb late winner

articles.description: MMA fighter Francis Ngannou says he intends to continue in boxing despite a heavy loss to Anthony Joshua on Friday.
articles.title: Francis Ngannou 'not done' with boxing despite heavy Anthony Joshua defeat

articles.description: Oliver Bearman marks himself out as a star of the future in Formula 1 on his last-minute debut for Ferrari at the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Oliver Bearman: Ferrari driver set to make history at Saudi Arabian Grand Prix

articles.description: Premier League leaders Liverpool host champions Manchester City on Sunday in a huge clash at the top of the table as both sides chase history.
articles.title: 'I see excellence when I face it' - Klopp on Guardiola

articles.description: An intense work ethic and an eye for detail helped England defence coach Felix Jones overcome a career-ending neck injury to become a double World Cup-winning coach.
articles.title: Facing Ireland 'doesn’t pull on heart strings now'

articles.description: Britain's Andy Murray falls to a straight-set defeat against Russian fifth seed Andrey Rublev in the third round at Indian Wells.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Andy Murray beaten in straight sets by Andrey Rublev
